page_text:
When the storm had gone away, 
The garden danced in bright array. 
Luna smiled, her heart so light, 
The flowers twirled in the sunny sight. 
"Thank you, Luna!" Rose did sing, 
While Sunny spun with a joyful spring. 
Together they laughed, beneath the sun, 
A happy ending, for everyone!
text_placement_suggestion: bottom of the page, below the illustration of the garden
